author: fnathan
title: Manchester United transfer news: Moussa Dembele chased by Red Devils and Chelsea alongside host of European giants
text:
mouss wanted Manchester United transfer news: Moussa Dembele chased by Red Devils and Chelsea alongside host of European giants 
French 20-year-old has impressed since moving north of the border from Fulham last summer and has a host of world's top sides after him Gossip 15th March 2017, 5:26 pm Updated: 15th March 2017, 7:03 pm
